name: Fuzzy Bear Hat
description:
Town clothes can no longer be equipped separately.

Speak to a Black Lion Armor Trader in any major city to exchange this for a helmet skin with the same look.

name: Banker Golem (2 weeks)
description: Double-click to access your account bank from anywhere. Reusable.

name: Bobblehead Laboratory
description:
Spawn a laboratory that you and your friends can interact with.
Adding this item to your wardrobe may slightly adjust its functionality.

name: Musical Bass Guitar
description: Double-click to equip this charr-inspired bass resonator guitar.

Self-Style Hair Kit
description: Double-click to modify your appearance settings for hair style, hair color, horns, and facial hair. This kit is consumed on accepting a new appearance.

name: Total Makeover Kit
description: Double-click to modify your appearance: height, physique, skin color, markings, face, hair, even gender. Race and profession will remain the same. This kit is consumed on accepting a new appearance.

name: Mini Spooky Ghost
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Mini Spooky Spider
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Mini Spooky Trio
description: Double-click to receive a mini spooky ghost, mini spooky skeleton, and mini spooky spider.

name: Mini Spooky Skeleton
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Mini Chainsaw the Skeleton
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Small Guild Discovery
description: Double-click to increase your currently represented guild's influence by 50 points.

name: Large Guild Discovery
description: Double-click to increase your currently represented guild's influence by 300 points.

name: Medium Guild Discovery
description: Double-click to increase your currently represented guild's influence by 100 points.
